description.value:
Access Tian Xia origin or follower of Nalinivati

You channel the blessings of Nalinivati to transform into a manifestation of her will. You can cast 5th-rank @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.Animal Form] as an occult innate spell once per day, but you can choose only snake form with the spell. You can spend an additional action casting animal form to also cast 5th-rank @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.Slither] centered on your location; Nalinivati's will ensures that the shadow snakes created by the spell never harm you, so you're unaffected by the spell. If you Dismiss animal form, the effects of slither end as well.
